attributes.action: Buy the first round after coronavirus restrictions are over for a UK staff do.
attributes.additional_details: We’ve gone through a lot, I’m sure you’ll agree. Hospitality is one of the hardest hit areas. Let’s kickstart the industry and have a right royal knees up at the same time, with a pint or soft drink for every adult in the UK.
attributes.background: To help kickstart the much maligned hospitality industry and have a right royal sigh of relief and knees up once all this is over. We would like the UK govt to put £220m behind the bars of the UK to buy the first round for every adult in the country. (54.8m x £4.00).

rejection.details: The UK Government are not responsible for organising "staff dos". You could start a new petition calling for specific support for hospitality such as a "drink out to help out scheme", if that's something you'd like to see.
